name.placeholder: Enter the full name of the data source

link.placeholder: Enter the link to the data sources homepage

image_url.placeholder: Enter the link to the data sources logo

entity.helper: An entity can be described by a data source

licence.placeholder: Enter the licence of the data

interface.placeholder: Enter the link to the interface

interface_type.placeholder: Enter the type of the interface - Typical interface types are API, REST API, SPARQL Endpoint

documentation.placeholder: Enter the link to the documentation

comment.placeholder: Feel free to enter any type of comment
